settings.text1: Magical themes kids can't get enough of

settings.custom_text: This foil art kit has to be one of the best things I bought for my son. It's one of those activities that keeps him calm and creatively engaged! It's also reduced his daily screen time, which was also a big win for my wife and me!

My son has always been OBSESSED with dinosaurs! He loved the art kit so much, he spends hours foiling his dinos & I’m personally relieved how it's kept him so focused for hours on end without creating a mess.

This is such an innovative art kit, I hadn’t come across foil art before! My daughter is obsessed with making foil art canvases filled with unicorns, princesses, and castles. She takes it with her even during family trips, and I love to see how she's so excited to show me what she creates next! It doesn’t make a mess either.

It's a great way to keep kids busy, and I highly recommend this Foil Fun kit for all working moms who want a new way to keep their kids occupied without screens. I just love seeing my son get so creative with it, he even uses the leftover stickers to decorate his personal belongings too!

My daughter is completely hooked, and I couldn't be happier with how creatively and patiently she works on her foil art. She also invites her friends over after school sometimes to do this together, and there’s barely any cleaning up to do after.

My son got this space foil art kit as a gift, and I'm just as fascinated with it as he is. He’s not usually into art & craft, but the whole concept of foil art keeps him interested. He’s not grabbing a screen as often as he did.

She's found a new way to send out the sweetest messages! She love making her greeting cards using cute foil art & customizing each card for me, my husband, and her friends with different stickers she thinks we would like.

settings.skillmatics_feature:
• 10 frameable canvases
  • 100 foil sheets
  • 100+ high quality stickers
  • 13 themes to choose from
  • Easy foil transference
  • Long lasting, durable foam stickers
settings.other_feature:
• 10-12 singular foil cards
  • Limited foil sheets
  • Little to no stickers
  • 2-3 limited themes
  • Foil sheets may not emboss correctly
  • The adhesive may dry up

settings.column_1_value: 100 Foil Sheet,100+ high quality stickers 10 frameable canvases
settings.column_2_value: Limited Foil Sheets10-12 singular foil cards Little to no sticker
Foil sheets may not  emboss correctly

settings.ans: Foil Fun by Skillmatics is a magical and mess-free foil art kit for kids that sparks their creativity and imagination. With so many colourful foil sheets and unique foam stickers to choose from, all kids have to do is peel their favourite stickers, press the foil sheets on top, and gently remove to bring canvases, bedroom walls and even their personal belongings to life.

settings.que: Are theme-based foil art kits available?
settings.ans: Yes, our Foil Fun art kits are available in a range of playful themes! You can explore foil art for kids in various themes like Outer Space, World of Animals, Unicorns & Princesses, and so much more.

settings.que: What are some benefits of Skillmatics’ Foil Fun Art Set?
settings.ans: Our Fun Foil art for kids improves creativity, imagination and curiosity among kids. It also improves their hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills as well.

settings.que: What does the Foil Art Kit include?
settings.ans: You’ll find different materials included in each theme of our Foil Art kit, but most of our Foil Fun kits come with picture canvases, colourful foil sheets, and unique foam stickers based on the theme you’ve chosen.

settings.que: What combos are available featuring Foil Fun art kits?
settings.ans: We have a range of different bundles available featuring our Foil Fun art kits, in both 2-pack and 3-pack combos. You can choose from various 2-pack combo options like the Sparkle & Shine Combo, Whimsical Wonderland Combo, Nature’s Delight Bundle, etc. You can also shop for a 3-pack combo for bigger savings!

settings.que: Are foil art kits for kids mess-free?
settings.ans: Yes, Foil Fun for kids is completely mess-free, for parents to avoid the hassle of cleaning up after. This foil art set is ideal for gifting on special occasions, or to simply bring home  as a fun surprise for your little artist.
